biotools.summary: CCIVR (Comprehensive Cis-NATs Identifier Via RNA-seq data) is a Python package tool that facilitates the identification of total cis-NATs (cis-natural antisense transcripts) from gene datasets.

bioschemas.name: CCIVR
bioschemas.summary: CCIVR (Comprehensive Cis-NATs Identifier Via RNA-seq data) is a Python package tool that facilitates the identification of total cis-NATs (cis-natural antisense transcripts) from gene datasets.
